tool_description: Processes user appeals for moderated reviews, evaluating appeal validity and managing the appeal workflow for disputed moderation decisions.

review_id.description: Unique identifier of the review being appealed

appeal_reason.description: User's stated reason for appealing the moderation decision

user_id.description: Unique identifier of the user making the appeal

error_messages: Invalid review ID: Review ID cannot be empty
Empty appeal reason: Appeal reason must be provided
Invalid original decision: Original decision must be a valid moderation decision
Empty appeal text: Detailed appeal explanation cannot be empty
Invalid user ID: User ID cannot be empty
usage: Provide review ID, appeal reason, original decision, appeal text, and user ID to process a review appeal. Returns appeal processing results and next steps.

appeal_status.description: Status of the appeal: accepted, rejected, under_review, requires_escalation

recommended_action.description: Recommended action based on appeal analysis

review_priority.description: Priority level for human review of the appeal
